abstract: The fastest growing group of gamers are children ages 2 to 5. They and their older brothers and sisters also cajole their parents into buying games, making them an important cohort for game marketers.
snippet: The fastest growing group of gamers are children ages 2 to 5. They and their older brothers and sisters also cajole their parents into buying games, making them an important cohort for game marketers.

headline.main: Playing From the Crib to the Console
